Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with Helios head symbol.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 110, 45, later damaged? Name Sodamos.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0841)
